description: Try our easy to follow Pistachio Biscuits recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Pistachio Biscuits Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 24 drops food colour (pink, blue or green)
1.25 cup pure icing sugar, sifted (for royal icing)
1 egg, 1 whole egg, 1 egg white for royal icing

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Line two large baking trays with baking paper.
Beat butter, sugar and vanilla in a bowl until pale and creamy.
Add to the butter mixture and stir until combined and add the pistachio as well.

Halve dough. Roll out one portion between two sheets of baking paper until 5mm thick. Cut out biscuits using a 6cm fluted cutter. Place onto prepared trays. Bake for 15 minutes or until firm. Cool on trays. Repeat with remaining dough.

Meanwhile, make the royal icing. Beat egg white with a wooden spoon until it thins and is frothy. Add icing sugar, 1 tbs at a time, beating after each addition until thick and combined. Colour if desired.

Reserve 2 tbs of the icing and spoon or spread remaining onto biscuits. In a small bowl, mix reserved icing with a few drops of food colour to achieve a soft pastel. Spoon into a small snaplock bag. Snip the corner and squeeze drops of coloured icing onto biscuits once white base has set.
